name: Chat360
description:
Chat360 provides a wide range of services focused on enhancing customer engagement, automating communication, and improving operational efficiency. Here's an overview of Chat360's services:

1. Omnichannel Chatbot Integration
Unified chatbot across WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook Messenger, Website, and more.
Seamless integration with third-party applications like CRM, payment gateways, and ticketing systems.
Supports conversational AI and NLP for personalized interactions.

2. WhatsApp Business API
Automate messaging for order confirmation, lead generation, customer support, and more.
Support for rich media templates (text, image, video, carousel, discount codes).
Enable features like WhatsApp Payments and automation triggers.

3. CRM Integration
Integration with tools like Zoho, Salesforce, and Leadsquared.
Real-time lead management and updates from multiple sources.
Enhanced segmentation and engagement based on CRM data.
